titleStmt.title: A declaration and motive of the persons trusted, usually meeting at Salters Hall in Breadstreet, to all well affected persons in the severall parishes within London, and the parts adjacent, for contributing the value of a meale weekly, towards the forming of some regiments of voluntiers, to be payd during these times of danger.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Committee for the Militia.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Oulton and G. Dexter for John Wright in the Old-Bailey,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
